competencyRequired._instruction: Enter the knowledge, skills, or abilities that are prerequisites for being able to use the learning resource.

educationalLevel._instruction: Add the level of the resource in terms of progression through an educational or training context, for example 'beginner', 'intermediate' or 'advanced'

learningResourceType._instruction: Add the type of the learning resource

teaches._instruction: Enter a description of the learning objectives.

timeRequired._instruction: Typical time it takes to work with or through this learning resource for the target audience.

about._instruction: Add the research product(s) to which this learning resource applies.
